void mos_mutex_init (  mos_mutex_t *  mt  ) 
 

Init a mutex data structure.

Must init before use.

Parameters:
mt Mutex to init

void mos_mutex_lock (  mos_mutex_t *  mt  ) 
 

Lock a mutex.

Blocks the thread if the mutex is already locked.

Parameters:
mt Mutex to lock

int8_t mos_mutex_try_lock (  mos_mutex_t *  mt  ) 
 

Take the lock if its free.

Parameters:
mt Current mutex (locked/unlocked)
Returns:
MUTEX_LOCKED if another thread already has a lock, else MUTEX_OK

void mos_mutex_unlock (  mos_mutex_t *  mt  ) 
 

Unlock a mutex so another thread can enter the protected area of code.

Parameters:
mt Mutex to unlock
